name: Raki
text: If you have a [Shandora Warrior] type character other than [Raki], this Character gains Blocker. (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

effect.text: If you have a [Shandora Warrior] type character other than [Raki], this Character gains Blocker.
You may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but this is not a game error. The card ID, set, number, and other fields are read from the printed text.
